en.bannerStart: This is a new service – your
en.bannerEnd: will help us to improve it.
en.warning: You cannot save the progress for the application so it is important you have everything you need before you get started.
en.heading: Submit an application to HM Courts and Tribunals Services
en.body: Use this service to upload and submit a completed application.
subBody: You might need to upload supporting documents with your completed application.

Some applications may ask for a fee, so make sure you have your payment details ready. You can apply for money off a court or tribunal fee (opens in a new tab). You should do this before you submit this application as you will need to provide the HWF number before you can send your application to the court. You need to apply for help with fee (opens in a new tab) before you continue with this application.
You will be asked a few simple questions. You can review the answers to these questions before you submit them with your application.

cy.bannerStart: Mae hwn yn wasanaeth newydd - bydd
cy.bannerEnd: eich adborth yn ein helpu ni i'w wella
cy.warning: Ni allwch gadw eich cynnydd felly mae’n bwysig bod gennych popeth rydych ei angen cyn i chi ddechrau.
cy.heading: Cyflwyno cais i Wasanaeth Llysoedd a Thribiwnlysoedd EF
cy.body: Defnyddiwch y gwasanaeth hwn i uwchlwytho a chyflwyno cais wedi’i gwblhau.
subBody: Efallai bydd arnoch angen uwchlwytho dogfennau ategol gyda'ch cais wedi'i gwblhau.

Gall rhai ceisiadau ofyn am ffi, felly gwnewch yn siwr bod gennych eich manylion talu wrth law. Gallwch wneud cais am ostyngiad o ffi llys neu dribiwnlys (yn agor mewn tab newydd). Dylech wneud hyn cyn i chi gyflwyno cais oherwydd bydd arnoch angen darparu’r rhif HWF cyn gallwch anfon eich cais i’r llys. Mae arnoch angen gwneud cais am help i dalu ffioedd (yn agor mewn tab newydd) cyn i chi barhau gyda’r cais hwn.
Gofynnir i chi ateb ychydig o gwestiynau syml. Gallwch adolygu’r atebion i’r cwestiynau hyn cyn i chi gyflwyno’ch cais.
